install.name: Blog Categories
install.author: StackIdeas
install.description: Lists down categories which are created in EasyBlog.

param.name: routingtype
param.label: Routing Type
param.description: Choose the routing type when generate url link

param.name: menuitemid
param.label: Use Menu Item
param.description: Select menu item if you have choose to use 'menu item' as routing type

param.name: layouttype
param.label: Layout type
param.description: Select what to display in the module

param.name: order
param.label: Ordering
param.description: Retrieve the tag cloud base on post count or title (useful when you are limiting the number of tags in the tag cloud).

param.name: catid
param.label: Category ID
param.description: Only select items from specific categories. Leave empty to select from all categories

param.name: sort
param.label: Sorting
param.description: Display categories in either ascending or descending order.

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (set it to 0 if categories limiting if not required).

param.name: showcount
param.label: Show counter
param.description: If enabled, the number of blog posts in the category will be displayed

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
